analysis.description:
GESToken.sendTokensToCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0xa4b54870cb409682d0531c772255e1cdc648d12d.sol#358-364) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(crowdsale,crowdsalePart) (/unique_contracts/0xa4b54870cb409682d0531c772255e1cdc648d12d.sol)

GESToken.sendTokensToFoundation (/unique_contracts/0xa4b54870cb409682d0531c772255e1cdc648d12d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
